Sidi Abdel Rahman (Arabic) bụ obodo dị n'ụsọ Oké Osimiri Mediterenian n'Ijipt
Sidi Abdel Rahman dị na Ọzara Ọdịda Anyanwụ Egypt nke dị n'ọnụ mmiri nke Oké Osimiri Mediterenian, nwere ọmarịcha osimiri, ma bụrụkwa ebe izu ike.
Enwere ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke ogbunigwe a na-atụghị anya ya, nke malitere site na Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ na mpaghara nke kpatara ọnwụ mmadụ ma gbochie mmepe na mpaghara ahụ kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ.
Sidi Abdel Rahman anọghị n'ebe a ma ama n'afọ 1942 nke Agha El Alamein nke Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Enwere ike ịchọta ili ozu na ili ozu maka ndị Allies n'ebe dị nso, na ọ dịkarịa ala ndị agha iri itoolu na itoolu na-ehi ụra n'ebe ahụ

A pụkwara ịchọta ozu ndị a na-amaghị aha ha nke ọtụtụ puku ndị agha Germany n'ebe ili ozu. Na Septemba 30, 1942, onye isi Luftwaffe bụ Hans-Joachim Marseille, onye kwuru na e gburu ụgbọelu 158 e bibiri megide ndị Allies, n'akụkụ ebe obibi ahụ
E ji pyramid mee akara n'ebe ahụ ihe dị ka kilomita 10 n'ebe ndịda obodo ahụ.

Sidi Abdel Rahman bụ naanị "ebe ezumike dị ala". Gulf of Sidi Abdel Rahman na Mediterenian gụnyere Al Alamein Hotel bụ nke ụlọ ọrụ Egypt General Company for Tourism and Hotels (EGOTH) rere na 2006, Emaar Egypt, onye enyemaka nke Emaar Dubai meriri ikike ịzụlite mpaghara ahụ. A ga-eji ego a natara site na ire ya mee ihe maka ịkwalite ụlọ nkwari akụ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Ijipt, dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka itinye ego Mahmoud Mohieldin si kwuo.

Onye mmepe ahụ, nke nwere nnukwu akpa, onye zụrụ Sidi Abdel Rahman tụrụ aro ịzụlite obodo n'afọ niile na nnukwu ego nke ijeri 1.74. Dị ka o kwere nkwa n'oge ire ere, Emaar wuru nnukwu ebe ezumike a na-akpọ Marassi Resort ozugbo ma ọ dị kilomita 24 ( mi) site na Al Alamain International Airport. DJ Bob Sinclair rụrụ ọrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, 2008 na Marassi. Ihe mbụ Emaar Egypt nyere n'ihu ọha na Egypt na 2015 bụ IPO kachasị ukwuu na Egypt, kemgbe 2007.
